description.content:
Network Topology Simulator with Chaos Engineering capabilities.

## Features
- Create and manage network topologies
- Deploy topologies to Kubernetes
- Apply chaos engineering (delay, loss, partition, etc.)
- Monitor network metrics and events
- Run diagnostic tests

Contact Support:
 Name: NetworkSim Team
